definitions: a person or thing that wrecks, damages, or destroys something

examples.text: she was unfairly portrayed as a marriage wrecker

shortDefinitions: person or thing that wrecks something

definitions: a person who breaks up damaged vehicles, demolishes old buildings, salvages wrecked ships, etc., to obtain usable spares or scrap.
shortDefinitions: person who breaks up damaged vehicles or demolishes old buildings to obtain usable spares

examples.text: they raced out with the wrecker when they heard there'd been an accident

definitions: a person on the shore who tries to bring about a shipwreck in order to profit from the wreckage.
shortDefinitions: person on shore who tries to bring about shipwreck
